title: Please rename Miscellaneous to General Discussion.
body:
This is my only major complaint, the lack of GD!Now, now.. I realize some Rioters absolutely hated NA GD, and some loved it. It even expanded enough for F.E.K to be born and changed the forum massively. GD returned to the boards on NA, and let's not lie, GD was 99.95% of the total forum, it was the most popular and active section of each forum (NA, EUW & OCE).

At the end of the day GD was a place to chill out and meet people, due to how laid back the moderation was, #BringBackGeeDee2014.

replies.body: Or they could just have a miscellaneous and a GD?

Except Miscellaneous is far more lenient of a topic than General Discussion was. In GD everything had to be related to LoL no exception. Misc combines GD with off topic.

So Misc is more broad and general than the old GD. This allows for off topic discussions where they WILL be seen, unlike how GD was the only populated section of the old forums.

> Except Miscellaneous is far more lenient of a topic than General Discussion was. In GD everything had to be related to LoL no exception. Misc combines GD with off topic.
> 
> So Misc is more broad and general than the old GD. This allows for off topic discussions where they WILL be seen, unlike how GD was the only populated section of the old forums.

Misc reminds me of a certain forum with wannabe body builders.
Well you'll have to give us an example.

If you want General Discussion, here it is.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/mNBeEEkI
